description.ruby-sapphire:
Minimizes the user’s size
to raise evasiveness.
description.emerald:
Minimizes the user’s size
to raise evasiveness.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user compresses
all the cells in its
body to raise its
evasiveness.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user compresses
its body to make
itself look smaller.
The user’s evasion
stat is boosted.

The user compresses
its body to make

description.black-white:

to make itself look smaller,
which sharply raises its evasiveness.

effect.full:
Raises the user's evasion by two stages.

stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's evasion by two stages.
